comments.comment: Please do not insult the intelligence of 6.9 million people. Also please understand that the country of origin of a particular style of clothing has nothing to do with the integrity of the person wearing it. You may be a field marshal that demands obedience from subordinates. But the people of the country do not have to accept an opinion just because you say it. So, please substantiate your opinions.
comments.author: Siri DE Alwis

comments.comment: Ranil should give the UNP leadership to a stronger person and there is no need to give any reason as everyone knows why. BUT Sajith is not the answer. Everyone knows what happened to SLFP after Mahinda took control of that part. The same thing will happen to UNP if Sajith gets leadership powers.

comments.comment:
Field Marshall Sarath Fonseka
Your speech is dead correct
I salute you unreservedly.
But something is missing in your analysis.The greatest blunders were made by the DRESS Designer turned Finance Minister who.said that Sri Lanka is not a SINHALA BUDDHIST country which angered the Buddhist population. Leader RANIL has displayed absolute idiocy by not correcting the lunatic statement by Mangala.
It was an unlimited bonus payment to SLPP. Besides he messed up the economy of the middle class and the poorer segment of the entire country. Why on earth did RW and MS gave this ass such an important M inistry? 
As long as this character and the Bank thief are in the UNP I could gurantee that this grand old PAR
TY will remain in.the OPPOSITION.
Please get rid of them including
 the other well known swindlers of the CENTRAL BANK 
OTHERWISE REST in.PEACE UNP and the country will go to dogs and buffalows.
comments.author: Thilak Ranaweera

comments.comment: Mr Fonseka your style of language was not correct too. Whatever you said on stage made Sajith loose votes. You were with Ranil and the old cronies in the UNP first. That was not correct. I have a lot of respect for you as a soldier. But no respect as a politician. Please learn lessons and amend your manners and language and principals. You are honest. Be straight too. Don't support rogues
comments.author: Iranganie Perera

replies.replyComment:
You are quite correct.While  SF is having a loose but tactful verbology the UNP has full of  crooks only to earn more and more and more money.
Except for many younger MPs veteran politicians in SLPP 
are hell bent on making more and more money with the exception of DULLES VASU.GUNAWARDANA. GLPERIES and the left gang

replies.replyComment: Thank you Sriyani have a nice day you too.
@Srimal Ranepura / obey danuwath kireemata sthuthiyi Shirantha. Api kenek geana hithanne mathupitin balalane .obata suba dawasak  !
Ekane malki aththa api hadawathin deyak kiyanawanam kelin balagena katha karanna onane.
Kawuru hari liyala dipu deyak ne peththappu vage kiyavuve

Kola balagena kiwwata eyage hardayen kiyana katha neme. Ekane ara galle face eke akkara 3 ayeth cheneta denna yanne. Habai iye boruwata kiwwa idam denne naha kiyala. Mathaka thiya ganna Meyala deyak karanne naha kiwwoth aniwaryen a deya karanawamai.
